column5: Today was the day wasnt it..Totally forgot..
after 30 something years, I forgot it was today too...

Sad day indeed. Almost everyone knew where they were when it was announced that Monday night or when they heard the terrible news. Howard Cosell made the tragic announcement during a Monday Night Football game I was watching and the crew went silent and as the news spread amongst the fans at the stadium I remember watching people crying in the stands. 30 years, where does time go?
